metadata.title: BrainGPT Translates Thoughts into Text Using Non-Invasive EEG
metadata.description: Researchers at the University of Technology Sydney have developed BrainGPT, a non-invasive system that decodes brainwaves into readable text using an EEG cap—offering new hope for those with locked-in syndrome and marking a major step forward in mind-to-text communication.
metadata.creator: Podcast

episodeTitle: BrainGPT Translates Thoughts into Text Using Non-Invasive EEG
episodeDescription: Researchers at the University of Technology Sydney have developed BrainGPT, a non-invasive system that decodes brainwaves into readable text using an EEG cap—offering new hope for those with locked-in syndrome and marking a major step forward in mind-to-text communication.
